pages.text: _Media is a form of mental energy external to a mind. All living creatures generate _media in trace amounts when thinking about anything, and after their thought is over it is released into the environment.$(br2)The art of casting $(thing)Hexes/$ is all about manipulating _media to do your bidding.

_Media can attract and repel itself, and the strength and mode of influence can be manipulated by drawing _media out into patterns. Scholars of the art used a concentrated blob of _media on the end of a stick: by waving it in the air in precise configurations, they are able to manipulate enough _media with enough ease to influence the world itself, in the form of a Hex.

Sadly, even a fully sentient being (like me, presumably) generates so little _media by themself it would be quite impractical to try and use my own brainpower to cast Hexes.$(br2)But, legend has it there are places deep under the earth where _media slowly accumulates, and grows into a crystalline form...
